de.bit.pl02.pp5.task02

Class Database

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.bit.pl02.pp5.task02.Database

  • public class Database
extends java.lang.Object
    The class Database can be used to create database objects and helps the user to interact with them. The user can give a directory in the read_director(String) method from which a table will be created with the images and the corresponding metadata. It is possible to print the values of the created table with the method see_table(). If the user only wants the metadata of a specific sample, then the metadata can be retrieved by specifying either the author or the title with the get_meta(String, String, String) method and be saved as a .txt file. The user can add images with the updatePicture(Image, int, String) method to the table. Columns: AUTHOR the name of the author TITLE the name of the title LINK the URL related to the image PICUTRE blob the image as a byte array
    Author:
    Shreya Kapoor, Sophia Krix, Gemma van der Voort
